mapper.select: select r.id as pay_id, r.customer_id, o.order_id from orders_ready as r inner join orders as o on r.id = o.pay_id left join order_pays as p on o.order_id = p.order_code where r.place_order_time >='2024-07-14 17:34:53' and r.place_order_time <='2024-07-15 09:29:19' order by r.place_order_time asc;
